This gorgeous river front 1930s apartment is perfect for those wanting character, convenience and a sense of community.Famously designed by Howard Lawson, this unique two bedroom strata titled apartment boasts river views from every room and a Scandinavian inspired interior with original lime-washed floorboards throughout, kitchen with stainless steel appliances/stove opening onto light-filled open plan living and dining area, sparkling bathroom, huge master bedroom with bay window, garden outlook and BIRs, separate study/second bedroom & communal laundry facilities. Located on the Yarra River with immediate access to public transport, Botanical Gardens, Toorak Rd and Chapel St shops and the unique Lawson Grove Café. With dual entrances to Alexandra Ave and Lawson Grove and two parking permits, it's the perfect inner-city pad.
